page.title: 12St.Giles School Sports Day
page.content: On Tuesday 16th of July we had a sports day.It was the first big sports day on our school field.Some of the events were three legged race,walking race,relay,obstacle,skipping and sprint.You got badges if you won, came 2nd or even 3rd.St. Giles school made their own badges.The three legged race is where your leg is tied to somebody elses leg and you run as fast as you can.We have house colours so the judge knows who to give the points to.If you are in green for example you try to wear a green T-shirt and shorts don't really matter.We had lines to run between which Mr Dumville marked out in the morning.We had great fun at sports day especially when the parents had a race.At the end the Paddy Edwards trophy was presented to the blue team.Paddy Edwards had been a keen local sportsman for many years.
